mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveStudentParentDetailList */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , SEQNO AS "seqNo" , FRST_NM AS "firstName" , LAST_NM AS "lastName" , GENDER AS "gender" , JOB AS "job" , ADDR AS "address" , PHONE AS "phone" FROM FRST.STD_PRNT_DETAIL WHERE STD_ID = #{studentID} ORDER BY SEQNO
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterStudentParentDetail */ INTO FRST.STD_PRNT_DETAIL ( STD_ID , SEQNO , FRST_NM , LAST_NM , GENDER , JOB , PHONE , ADDR , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{studentID} , #{seqNo} , COALESCE (#{firstName}, '') , COALESCE (#{lastName}, '') , COALESCE (#{gender}, '') , COALESCE (#{job}, '') , COALESCE (#{phone}, '') , COALESCE (#{address}, '') , COALESCE (#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE (#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE (#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE (#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateNewsEvent */ FRST.NEWS_EVENT SET TITLE = COALESCE(#{title}, TITLE) , CONTENT_HTML = COALESCE(#{contentHtml}, CONTENT_HTML) , CONTENT_DESC = COALESCE(#{contentDesc}, CONTENT_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) WHERE NEVNT_ID = #{newsEventID}
